full_summary:
# Electrical Maintenance Services

## Tender Information
### Reference Number
cb-945-85907282

### Amendment Number
3

### Solicitation Number
AB013

### Publication Date
2024-05-16

### Tender Closing Date
2024-06-10T15:00:00 EST

### Expected Contract Start Date
2024-06-24

### Expected Contract End Date
2029-03-31


## Tender Description
The National Capital Commission (NCC) is seeking a contractor to provide Electrical Maintenance Services for NCC Assets. The primary objective is to provide consistent quality standards and ensure the reliable, safe operation of electrical infrastructure within the geographic boundaries.


## TERM
The resulting Contract and Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) will be for a period of five (5) years, commencing on the date of award and ending on March 31st, 2029.


## BID DEADLINE
Submissions must be received no later than 3 p.m. EST on June 10th, 2024 by email at [Bids-soumissions@ncc-ccn.ca](mailto:Bids-soumissions@ncc-ccn.ca) with a reference to tender file #AB013.


## INQUIRIES
To ensure the integrity of this Contract/RFSO process, all enquiries and other communications must be directed only to Alyssa Brook, Senior Contract Officer by email at [alyssa.brook@ncc-ccn.ca](mailto:alyssa.brook@ncc-ccn.ca) no later than five (5) business days prior to the date set for solicitation closing to allow sufficient time to provide a response.


## Important Notes

* Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted.
* There is no public opening scheduled.
* Interested proponents must not contact any other employee of the NCC, or other persons involved in this solicitation to discuss questions regarding the Contract/RFSO process.

Please refer to the provided attachments for additional information.

Attachments:
* [AB013 - Addendum 1 - Addenda No. 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38099/ab013---addendum-1---addenda-no.-1.pdf)
* [AB013 - Electrical Maintenance Services](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38099/ab013---electrical-maintenance-services_0.pdf)
*
